faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our plans

questions.question: What's the difference between Free and Pro plans?
questions.answer: The Free plan includes 1 optimization per month with basic features. The Pro plan offers unlimited optimizations, advanced AI models, professional templates, and priority support.

questions.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
questions.answer: Yes! You can cancel your monthly subscription anytime. The Pro Lifetime plan is a one-time payment and cannot be cancelled.

questions.question: What file formats are supported?
questions.answer: We support PDF, DOCX, and text files. You can download your optimized resumes in .txt (Free plan) or .docx (Pro plan) formats.

questions.question: How does the AI optimization work?
questions.answer: Our AI analyzes your resume and job description, identifying key keywords and improvement areas to increase your compatibility with ATS systems.

questions.question: Is there a money-back guarantee?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact us for a full refund.
